body_html:
@peterjc123 Thanks! I installed VC 2017 components that were shown there except vc++ 2017 v141 toolset (x86 x64) because it was to available. Setup.py run for 50 min and through me this:

"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj" (default target) (18) ->
(Link target) ->
LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test
.vcxproj]

"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj" (default target) (29) ->
LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vc
xproj]

1468 Warning(s)
2 Error(s)

(tensorflow) C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build>IF ERRORLEVEL 1 exit 1
Failed to run 'tools\build_pytorch_libs.bat --with-cuda --with-nnpack caffe2 nanopb libshm_windows'

body:
@peterjc123 Thanks! I installed VC 2017 components that were shown there except vc++ 2017 v141 toolset (x86 x64) because it was to available. Setup.py run for 50 min and through me this:

"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj" (default target) (18) ->
(Link target) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test
.vcxproj]


"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj" (default target) (29) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vc
xproj]

    1468 Warning(s)
    2 Error(s)

(tensorflow) C:\Users\Yuliia\Install\pytorch\build>IF ERRORLEVEL 1 exit 1
Failed to run 'tools\build_pytorch_libs.bat --with-cuda --with-nnpack caffe2 nanopb libshm_windows'
